## Properties

| Property      | Attribute    | Description                                                                   | Type                                    | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `breakpoints` | --           | Breakpoints map. Ex: `{ sm: 640, md: 768 }` -> CSS vars `--bp-sm`, `--bp-md`. | `undefined \| { [x: string]: number; }` | `undefined` |
| `hostClass`   | `host-class` | Optional class name applied to wrapper.                                       | `string \| undefined`                   | `undefined` |
| `zIndexScale` | --           | z-index scale map. Ex: `{ overlay: 1000 }` -> CSS var `--z-overlay`.          | `undefined \| { [x: string]: number; }` | `undefined` |
